titleStmt.title: An A.B.C. or holy alphabet conteyning some plaine lessons gathered out of the word, to the number of the letters in the English alphabet, to enter young beginners in the schoole of Christ.
titleStmt.author: E. C., fl. 1626.
Cancellar, James, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I N[orton] for William Shefford, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes head alley,

notesStmt.note: Epistle to the reader signed: E.C.
Sometimes wrongly attributed to James Cancellar.
Identified as STC 4563 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes head alley
